documentation.text:
@notice  Sets the minimum amount of tokens required to stake.
 @param minimumDepositAmount_ provide in without adding the decimals for the token.
@notice pauseNewDeposits pauses deposits - not allowing new deposits.
@notice unpauseNewDeposits unpauses deposits - allowing new deposits.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BasedSigmaStaking: This contract is no longer accepting new stakes. Users can still withdraw."

arguments.value: BasedSigmaStaking: This contract is no longer accepting new stakes. Users can still withdraw.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BasedSigmaStaking: This contract is no longer accepting new stakes. Users can still withdraw."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BasedSigmaStaking: Please stake above Minimum Deposit Amount!"

arguments.value: BasedSigmaStaking: Please stake above Minimum Deposit Amount!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BasedSigmaStaking: Please stake above Minimum Deposit Amount!"

documentation.text:
@notice Unstakes all tokens and withdraws them to the user's wallet.
 @return value of tokens unstaked.
@notice Unstake specified amount of tokens and withdraw them to the user's wallet. Will round up to balance if difference is < 1 token.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

getStakedValue(address).details: it calculates the user stake value using their shares and tvl.

params.staker_: Address of the user to check staked value for.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.minimumDepositAmount_: provide in without adding the decimals for the token.

stakeTokens(uint256).details: Calculates shares based on tvl and staked amount. Adds shares to user. TVL must be increased after share calculation.

params.stakeAmount_: amount of tokens to stake. Must be above minimumDepositAmount.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getStakedValue(address).notice: Retrieves the user's current staked value.

pauseNewDeposits().notice: pauseNewDeposits pauses deposits - not allowing new deposits.

setMinimumDeposit(uint256).notice: Sets the minimum amount of tokens required to stake.

stakeTokens(uint256).notice: Deposits and stakes the specified token. Staking contract must be approved for magnet token.

unpauseNewDeposits().notice: unpauseNewDeposits unpauses deposits - allowing new deposits.

unstakeAll().notice: Unstakes all tokens and withdraws them to the user's wallet.

unstakeTokens(uint256).notice: Unstake specified amount of tokens and withdraw them to the user's wallet. Will round up to balance if difference is < 1 token.
